topic: Habit Formation for Students: Make Good Study Habits Stick

refs.content: In daily-life study, habit automaticity grew asymptotically; median ~66 days but wide range depending on behavior and person.
Start tiny, anchor to existing routines, celebrate; practical recipes to lower activation energy.
Habits as context–response associations; environment design is key to sustaining behavior.

special_instructions: Give a habit loop worksheet (cue→routine→reward), anchor maps to class schedule, and troubleshooting for lapses.
